article.description: Junior Robinson had 16 of his 23 points in the second half and handed out eight assists as Mount St. Mary's won its third in a row and kept Coppin State winless on the season 66-53 on Friday night.
article.headline: Robinson, Mount St. Mary's beat Coppin State 66-53
article.linkText: Robinson, Mount St. Mary's beat Coppin State 66-53
article.story: BALTIMORE -- Junior Robinson had 16 of his 23 points in the second half and handed out eight assists as Mount St. Mary's won its third in a row and kept Coppin State winless on the season 66-53 on Friday night. Chris Wray added eight points and 11 rebounds for the Mount (6-7), which used a 14-2 run to take control late in the first half and led by double digits throughout the second. The Mountaineers led 33-21 at halftime and opened the second with a 12-4 run to extend the lead to 20. They had their largest lead with 4:17 left at 62-41. Lamar Morgan had 18 points and Karonn Davis added 12 for Coppin State (0-13). Mount St. Mary's matched the program's 1989-90 team for the most nonconference wins since it moved to Division I in 1988-89.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
